__e: A suggestion's not the same as an order, is it?
So your note is "get more people to watch it."
It's the most important thing in the world to you.
No, my date is considerably younger and I just wanted to get your input on what attire you might think would be appropriate.
Do you think that there's any way, anytime soon that you might be able to give me some pointers on how to stick it to the enemy?
Any suggestions on how I'm supposed to move on with my life, knowing what my mom did to you?
Ooh, thank you, I never would've thought of that one.
You're right.With your job in danger, of courseyou'd want to make all the decisions without any input whatsoever from me.
Well, my tip to you is, give people what they want and they'll come.
If you need any suggestions for when we land, I can recommend doing nothing, seeing nobody, eating nowhere. Ah.
It was lucky for me that I had a suggestion for the government and that they had a box for me to put it in.
Perhaps, you have some suggestions for... getting us from here to there.
